Articles.Content:
Hey peepz,

first time forum post here. My KSP install seems to crash at random times (often when switching back to KSC from either VAB or from flying a craft). The error log is in the link. Anyone know what's going on?

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/gvqtk8z87r280kj/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/gvqtk8z87r280kj/output_log.txt?dl=0)

Please let me know if you need any other info!

Based on your logs, it looks like you are running out of RAM. Instead of using ATM to manage your textures, as your logs suggest, try using the method I posted here - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115069-0-90-Possible-Windows-Memory-Wall-Crash-Workaround](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115069-0-90-Possible-Windows-Memory-Wall-Crash-Workaround) 

I too was using ATM, but with all the mods I had installed, ATM was not able to manage all the textures and still keep them high enough quality to look good. After much trial and error, I came up with the workaround I posted in the link above.
Did the workaround, works a treat! Thanks a million <3
